subject: All Star Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltrán, José Reyes and David Wright were voted to start in the All-Star Game, and Billy Wagner was added to the N.L. roster by manager Tony La Russa.
snippet: Carlos Beltrán, José Reyes and David Wright were voted to start in the All-Star Game, and Billy Wagner was added to the N.L. roster by manager Tony La Russa.
